title: 94/667/EC: Commission Decision of 6 October 1994 concerning the importation into the Community of fresh pigmeat, pigmeat products, live pigs, porcine semen and porcine embryos from Switzerland and amending Decisions 81/526/EEC, 91/449/EEC, 92/460/EEC and 93/199/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 October 1994 concerning the importation into the Community of fresh pigmeat, pigmeat products, live pigs, porcine semen and porcine embryos from Switzerland and amending Decisions 81/526/EEC, 91/449/EEC, 92/460/EEC and  93/199/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (94/667/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Part 2 of the Annex to Decision 93/199/EEC the words in brackets after 'Switzerland' are deleted.
This Decision shall apply from the 10th day following notification to Member States.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
